1.22.name: wordpress/application-maker-crm-edition
1.22.description:
Application Maker | CRM Edition

Version: 1.25 | CRM Edition | Last update date: 30 may 2013. And more releases to come soon.

Last update 30 may 2013: IMPORTANT! fixing a bug on the export csv. The export csv was NOT working anymore. (and we added also the possibility to export the COMMENTS in a post type but its not appearing yet on FO) Last update 28 may 2013: IMPORTANT! fixing a bug with the links to the plugin folder, that was sometime creating a problem to load all the assets, JS css etc. Previous Last update: fixing a bug on the Shortcode to add a contact form on your wesite. More infos about this here: http://apmcrm2013.15gl.net/how-to-add-a-form-on-you-web-site-to-capture-leads/

For more informations, we have now done a basic simple plugin minisite specially to support this plugin:
